These guides are for setting up network connections. They explain such things as setting up network cards or wireless connections to get Internet or local network access.

== Introduction ==
Prior to configuring your networking adapter, make sure it is installed properly.  Verify your installation has the correct module/driver to support the hardware.
Check our sections on general hardware in case of doubt.
* Ubuntu:HardwareSupport - Main hardware support page.
* TroubleShootingGuide - Troubleshooting guides

== Wired networking ==

* <nowiki>[[EthernetOverFirewire]]</nowiki> - How to use Ethernet over Firewire. (Work in progress)
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupportComponentsWiredNetworkCards|HardwareSupportComponentsWiredNetworkCards]]</nowiki> - Hardware support for wired network cards.
* AccessingNetwareShares - How to automatically mount Netware Shares.
* http://tldp.org/HOWTO/PLIP.html - How to use the parallel port to connect to two computers.
* <nowiki>[[UbuntuBonding]]</nowiki> - How to Configure the bonding driver

== Wireless networking ==
* <nowiki>[[WifiDocs|WifiDocs]]</nowiki> - Guides on installing and managing Wireless Devices.
* UbuntuWirelessRouter - Guide on setting up Ubuntu as a router, with wireless capabilities.
* <nowiki>[[Router]]</nowiki> - New guide on setting up Ubuntu as a router, with wireless capabilities.
 
 network cards.
* <nowiki>[[WifiDocs-WirelessAccessPoint|WirelessAccessPoint]]</nowiki> - Howto setup a Wireless Access Point

== Internet ==

* '''<nowiki>[[InternetHowto]]</nowiki>''' - General guide for getting connected to the Internet.
* <nowiki>[[DialupModemHowto]]</nowiki> - How to get your narrowband modem installed correctly.
* <nowiki>[[ADSLPPPoE|ADSL PPPoE connect]]</nowiki> - How to set up Ubuntu to use an ethernet ADSL modem using PPPoE.
* <nowiki>[[UsbAdslModem]]</nowiki> - How to set up Ubuntu to use a USB ADSL modem.
* <nowiki>[[BluetoothDialup]]</nowiki> - How to configure PPP dialup through a Bluetooth-compatible mobile phone.
* <nowiki>[[CableDialup]]</nowiki> - How to configure PPP dialup through a cable-connected mobile phone.
* <nowiki>[[MobileWirelessBroadband]]</nowiki> - Guides to installing and configuring mobile broadband (eg. iBurst) devices.
* <nowiki>[[IpwirelessPcmcia]]</nowiki> - How to setup Kubuntu for Sentech Mywireless using the IPWireless pcmcia modem.
* <nowiki>[[SharingMobileBroadband]]</nowiki> - How to set up Mobile broadband (e.g. HSPA), and sharing this over wired and wireless ethernet
